Notes: A large star-shaped ring that launches the player from one point to another when using the Spin Attack nearby. If the object is SuperSpinDriverGreen, the model SuperSpinDriverEmpty will be loaded and the Launch Star cannot be used until the player has collected all three special Green Stars.

Obj_arg0.Name: Flight Time
Obj_arg0.Description: How long it takes to complete the flight. Default 300.

Obj_arg1.Name: Shadow Length
Obj_arg1.Description: Sets the shadow drop length. Default is 1000.

Obj_arg2.Name: Player Pull Type
Obj_arg2.Description: Specifies how the player gets pulled into the Launch Star when nearby.

Values.Notes: Doesn't get pulled into Launch Star

Obj_arg3.Name: Camera Count
Obj_arg3.Description: The number of event cameras to be used during the flight.

Obj_arg4.Name: Appearance Jingle
Obj_arg4.Description: Specifies how the appearance jingle will be played.

Obj_arg5.Name: Player Rotation
Obj_arg5.Description: The initial rotation of the player used before the player gets launched. This also affects the angle at which the player lands.

Obj_arg6.Name: Respawn Type
Obj_arg6.Description: Specifies whether the object should reappear after dying or not.

Values.Notes: Object needs to be spawned again
Object spawns if it has already appeared before dying

Obj_arg7.Name: Draw Path Range Index
Obj_arg7.Description: The index of this Launch Star's path that is used for updating the segment of the flight path that should be rendered. Useless in SMG2 since this feature is dummied-out in that game.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: If used, the Launch Star will be shrunken an unusable until the switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: Once activated, the Launch Star will disappear. If the switch gets deactivated again, it will reappear.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The path that the player will fly along.

Group.Description: Used to group the Launch Star with a TicoFat-like object. The objects in this group will appear once the TicoFat-like object disappears.

Message.Description: Optional text to be displayed on its center. Needs to be specified in the zone's text file.

Camera.Description: Used when flying. Multiple camera configurations can be used, the count needs to be specified by Obj_arg3, though. Furthermore, 出現イベント用 is used for appearance.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Objects of this class can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
